snippet.title: Monstrum 2 - Official Cinematic Trailer | 2020
snippet.description:
Enter an immersive metal labyrinth where survival will require all your stealth and resourcefulness.
Sign up for Closed Beta now!: https://www.monstrumgame.com/closed-beta-sign-up
Pre-order at a special price now!: https://pre-order.monstrumgame.com
Wishlist Monstrum 2 on Steam!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1093170/Monstrum_2

Monstrum 2 is the asymmetric multiplayer sequel to rogue-like survival horror title, Monstrum. Combining the tense first-person stealth gameplay of the original award-nominated single player with fast-paced adrenaline-pumping chases of modern co-op action games, Monstrum 2 allows you to play as one of up to four human prisoners, or stalk the abandoned oceanic research facility as one of several terrifying monsters with different abilities.

The procedurally-generated environment changes with each playthrough, so stay on your feet as the layout, puzzles, items, and obstacles are randomized in each match.
